column2: What the hell?! How do you always have a comeback for everything?!
It’s not hard, just have an open mind and listen to what others have to say.
You talk so damn complicated. Bet it’s just so I don’t get it!
Honestly, it seems like you don’t want to understand. Like someone hurt you, and now you take it out on others to feel better.
Try being more empathetic, no one’s gonna hurt you for it.
I was just passin by n saw u there…
What u did was rlly dope
Yea, he’s famous for not lettin ppl leave for another city.
He messes w the girls, but he lets the guys go cuz he’s scared of them.
So basically, you’re just a huge coward.
The way u took him down was sick, fr badass.
Thank you so much, Mia. You’re really kind.
